title: Sonos Reports Progress Made Against Climate Action Plan, Showcases Commitment to Product Longevity and ... - Yahoo Finance
summary: Sonos released its annual Listen Better Report, detailing its ESG efforts, such as sustainability goals, new product releases, carbon neutrality strategies, and philanthropic initiatives.
green_innovation: TRUE - The article highlights Sonos' commitment to environmental sustainability through its Climate Action Plan, sustainable product design, and philanthropic efforts, aligning with the definition of green innovation.
business_innovation: FALSE - While the article discusses new product releases and sustainability efforts, the primary focus is on environmental and social impact rather than significant changes to the firm's business processes.
green_product: TRUE - Sonos' new product releases focus on sustainable design, incorporating recycled materials, energy-efficient features, and eco-friendly packaging, aligning with the definition of a green product.
green_process: TRUE - Sonos emphasizes sustainable practices in its product development, including reduced energy consumption, use of recycled materials, and eco-friendly design elements, meeting the criteria for a green process.
product_or_process: Sonos Era 100, Sonos Era 300, Sonos Move 2
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 334310 - Audio and Video Equipment Manufacturing, 334220 - Radio and Television Broadcasting and Wireless Communications Equipment Manufacturing, 335991 - Carbon and Graphite Product Manufacturing, 334290 - Other Communications Equipment Manufacturing
greenwashing: FALSE - The article provides detailed information about Sonos' sustainability efforts, including product design, carbon neutrality initiatives, philanthropy, and transparency, demonstrating a genuine commitment to environmental responsibility.
